text: The sm namespace contain all API features related to Scrap Mechanic.
Returns whether the game is currently running on the hosting player's computer.
return: Whether the game is running on the host.

text: Returns the current version of the game as a string.
return: The current version of the game.

text: Returns whether an object exists in the game. This is useful for checking whether a reference to an object is valid.
Returns whether the script is currently running in server mode. Otherwise, it is running in client mode. Server mode only occurs when [sm.isHost] is true.
return: Whether the script is running in server mode.
